channel.title: Making NPC dialogue
channel.description:
does someone knows how to make a dailogue for a NPC
so that when you click talk at a NPC for example (2904) he opens up a dialogue

item.title: Making NPC dialogue
item.dc:creator: @lollie lollie
item.description:
@lollie wrote:

[code]/NPC Talking/
public void UpdateNPCChat() {
/sendFrame126("", 4902);
sendFrame126("", 4903);
sendFrame126("", 4904);
sendFrame126("", 4905);
sendFrame126("", 4906);/
sendFrame126("", 976);
switch (NpcDialogue) {

		case 1:
			/*sendFrame200(4901, 554);
			sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902);
			sendFrame126("Good day, how can I help you?", 4904);
			sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901);
			sendFrame164(4900);
			*/
			sendFrame200(4883, 591);
			sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
			sendFrame126("Good day, how can I help you?", 4885);
			sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
			sendFrame164(4882);
			NpcDialogueSend = true;
			break;[/code]

???

if this is the right place

how do i make it so it works for npc: 2904 i tryed it 1 time but it didn’t worked
